title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Packers, Bears, Raiders, Clippers
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Packers, Bears, Raiders, Clippers
description:
Jordan Love being the third string QB is a bad sign

The Clippers flipped a switch last night because it's the playoffs

The Bears refuse to admit they made a mistake drafting Mitch Trubisky

The Raiders will not have a good season


Guest: Doug Gottlieb

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
